name: fhir-package-installer
description: A utility module for downloading, indexing, caching, and managing FHIR packages from the FHIR Package Registry and Simplifier
author: Outburn Ltd.

scripts.build:ncc: ncc build src/index.ts --external fs-extra --external tar-stream --external temp --no-cache --out dist
scripts.build: npm run clean:build && npm run build:ncc
scripts.dist-to-module: rimraf node_modules/fhir-package-installer && npm run build && node test/dist-to-module.js
scripts.pretest: npm run dist-to-module && npm run check-registries
